fix: Update device template cards to match master device template style

- Move brand/model to card content area
- Add visible action buttons at bottom \(Duplicate, Edit, Delete\)
- Add Active badge at bottom left
- Add delete confirmation dialog
- Match badge colors and layout with master device templates

EOF
\)")

Bash(sshpass -p '@1996SolaR' ssh root@159.223.224.203 "docker exec -i sdc-backend python -c ""
import os
from supabase import create_client
url = os.environ.get\(''SUPABASE_URL''\)
key = os.environ.get\(''SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY''\)
supabase = create_client\(url, key\)
# Get earliest and latest heartbeat
result = supabase.table\(''controller_heartbeats''\).select\(''timestamp''\).order\(''timestamp'', desc=False\).limit\(1\).execute\(\)
earliest = result.data[0][''timestamp''] if result.data else ''No data''
result2 = supabase.table\(''controller_heartbeats''\).select\(''timestamp''\).order\(''timestamp'', desc=True\).limit\(1\).execute\(\)
latest = result2.data[0][''timestamp''] if result2.data else ''No data''
# Count total
count = supabase.table\(''controller_heartbeats''\).select\(''id'', count=''exact''\).execute\(\)
print\(f''Earliest heartbeat: {earliest}''\)
print\(f''Latest heartbeat: {latest}''\)
print\(f''Total heartbeats: {count.count}''\)
""")

Bash(sshpass -p '@1996SolaR' ssh root@159.223.224.203 "docker exec -i sdc-backend python -c ""
import os
from supabase import create_client
url = os.environ.get\(''SUPABASE_URL''\)
key = os.environ.get\(''SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY''\)
supabase = create_client\(url, key\)

# Find the site named ''Crusher 1''
sites = supabase.table\(''sites''\).select\(''id, name''\).execute\(\)
crusher_site = next\(\(s for s in sites.data if ''Crusher'' in s[''name'']\), None\)
if crusher_site:
    print\(f''Site: {crusher_site}''\)
    
    # Get the master device \(controller\) for this site
    master = supabase.table\(''site_master_devices''\).select\(''id, controller_id, device_type''\).eq\(''site_id'', crusher_site[''id'']\).execute\(\)
    print\(f''Master devices: {master.data}''\)
    
    if master.data:
        controller_id = master.data[0].get\(''controller_id''\)
        if controller_id:
            # Get earliest and latest heartbeat for THIS controller
            earliest = supabase.table\(''controller_heartbeats''\).select\(''timestamp''\).eq\(''controller_id'', controller_id\).order\(''timestamp'', desc=False\).limit\(1\).execute\(\)
            latest = supabase.table\(''controller_heartbeats''\).select\(''timestamp''\).eq\(''controller_id'', controller_id\).order\(''timestamp'', desc=True\).limit\(1\).execute\(\)
            count = supabase.table\(''controller_heartbeats''\).select\(''id'', count=''exact''\).eq\(''controller_id'', controller_id\).execute\(\)
            print\(f''Controller ID: {controller_id}''\)
            print\(f''Earliest heartbeat for this controller: {earliest.data[0][""timestamp""] if earliest.data else ""None""}''\)
            print\(f''Latest heartbeat for this controller: {latest.data[0][""timestamp""] if latest.data else ""None""}''\)
            print\(f''Total heartbeats for this controller: {count.count}''\)
        else:
            print\(''No controller_id assigned to master device''\)
else:
    print\(''Site not found''\)
""")
Bash(sshpass -p '@1996SolaR' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@159.223.224.203 "cd /opt/solar-diesel-controller && git pull && docker-compose up -d --build")
